Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-7345 affecting package gdk-pixbuf2 for versions less than 2.42.10-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-7345 affecting package gdk-pixbuf2 for versions less than 2.42.10-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package gdk-pixbuf2 is earlier than 2.42.10-4, affected by CVE-2025-7345
